overview: There’s no need to feel too sorry for the likes of Tim Law, Mike James and Dick Casey – truth is, no matter what they might like to pretend, they thoroughly enjoyed putting their butts on the line in this second installment of ass-stretching craziness! As you’ll very quickly discover when you see Fabian Baptiste, Shane Barret give these hungry holes the poking they most definitely deserve. And don’t worry, no twinks were hurt in the making of this movie; though it’s unlikely that their asses will ever quite be the same again!
title: Twinks Destroyed 2
